snippet: The strides that eBay has made in the mobile market have impressed investors, helping propel its stock price to a 68 percent gain last year.
abstract: EBay says fourth-quarter profit tops analysts' projections as holiday shoppers flock to its Internet shopping mall and digital payment service; earnings were $751 million, or 57 cents a share, down 62 percent from $2 billion, or $1.51 a share, from year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: The strides that eBay has made in the mobile market have impressed investors, helping propel its stock price to a 68 percent gain last year.

headline.seo: EBay Tops Forecasts on Holiday Sales
headline.main: EBay Tops Forecasts on Sales for Holidays
headline.print_headline: EBay Tops Forecasts On Sales For Holidays
